Package stacs.yahtzee

Interface IYahtzeeModel

public interface IYahtzeeModel
This interface defines the model for a game of Yahtzee. It relies on numerous other classes, such as 'Player' and 'Dice'. The rules of Yahtzee as it is implemented here can be found at: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yahtzee One exception to the rules in this implementation is that there is no bonus for rolling multiple 'yahtzee's.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    IPlayer getActivePlayer()
    Returns the player who's turn it is.
    int getCurrentRound()
    Returns the number of the current round.
    java.util.List<IDie> getDice()
    Returns the dice that belong to the current game.
    java.util.List<IPlayer> getPlayerList()
    Returns this game's list of players.
    java.util.List<IPlayer> getPlayersWithHighestScore()
    Returns a list containing one player with the highest score, or multiple players who are tied for the lead.
    int getTotalRounds()
    Returns the total number of rounds in the game.
    java.util.List<IPlayer> getWinners()
    If the game is done, this method returns a list containing either the player who won, or the players who tied for first place.
    boolean isDone()
    Method to check if the game is finished.
    void registerTurnFinished​(IPlayer playerFinishingTurn)
    Called by a player object when the player finishes their turn.
    void setActivePlayer​(IPlayer newActivePlayerOrder)
    Sets the active player for this game.
    void setDice​(java.util.List<IDie> dice)
    Sets this game's dice.
    void setPlayers​(java.util.List<IPlayer> players)
    Sets this game's list of players.

  • Method Details

    • setDice

      void setDice​(java.util.List<IDie> dice)
      Sets this game's dice.

    • getDice

      java.util.List<IDie> getDice()
      Returns the dice that belong to the current game.

    • setPlayers

      void setPlayers​(java.util.List<IPlayer> players)
      Sets this game's list of players.

    • getPlayerList

      java.util.List<IPlayer> getPlayerList()
      Returns this game's list of players.

    • setActivePlayer

      void setActivePlayer​(IPlayer newActivePlayerOrder)
      Sets the active player for this game.

    • getActivePlayer

      IPlayer getActivePlayer()
      Returns the player who's turn it is.

    • getCurrentRound

      int getCurrentRound()
      Returns the number of the current round.

    • getTotalRounds

      int getTotalRounds()
      Returns the total number of rounds in the game.

    • registerTurnFinished

      void registerTurnFinished​(IPlayer playerFinishingTurn)
      Called by a player object when the player finishes their turn. This allows the model to assign the next player as the active player, and if necessary it increments the round or finishes the game.

    • getPlayersWithHighestScore

      java.util.List<IPlayer> getPlayersWithHighestScore()
      Returns a list containing one player with the highest score, or multiple players who are tied for the lead.
      Returns:
      A list of one or more players with the highest score

    • getWinners

      java.util.List<IPlayer> getWinners()
      If the game is done, this method returns a list containing either the player who won, or the players who tied for first place.
      Returns:
      A list of one or more players with the highest score at the end of the game

    • isDone

      boolean isDone()
      Method to check if the game is finished. This always returns true after the last player's turn in the last round.
      Returns:
      True if the game is finished, otherwise false
